message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500. This is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,800. I'm willing to meet you halfway between your price and the value you mentioned it's worth to you ($10,000).
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $10,800 is still a bit low for me.  How about we split the difference again and settle on $11,150? This way, we both get closer to our desired price.

I understand your perspective, but I'm still not comfortable with $11,150. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but this time I'll offer $10,900. I think this is a fair compromise considering the value I place on the product.
